events.description: https://programme.annecyfestival.com/en/program/event/95e1880d-688f-4b71-b16a-2312ea3e10d4 What is your editorial strategy?Finnish-speaking YLE TV2 is the biggest broadcaster of kid’s programs when measured by ratings and audience satisfaction in Finland. YLE’s FVOD service Areena gets about 6,2 M starts on kids programming per week (population of Finland is 5,4 M). Pikku Kakkonen magazine show is one of the biggest brands at YLE. Its main focus is the 3-6-year-old kids. For the 7-12-year-old kids YLE has an interactive brand called Galaxi. Its universe can be found on www.yle.fi/galaxi. BUU-Klubben is aired by the Swedish-speaking channel YLE Fem. Its main focus is the 4-7-year-olds.
